properties.Observatio: A tank has been built at the site of spring and the water flowing from it has been prepared for bathing and Water is pumped from that tank with the help of a pump and distributed to 60 families.
properties.Descriptio: Fabricating & fixing security weld mesh in open type buildings in GI weld mesh 50mm x 50mm SWG 10, welded on 40mm x 40mm x 5mm angle frame complete with application of two coats enamel paint over two coats of anticorrosive paint and complete. All as per

properties.Observatio: There is a about 1.0 acres reserve around the spring.   Water project is being implemented using Spring water.
properties.Descriptio:
Plant 30 no of Kumbuk trees around the spring

Supplying of Kumbuk seedlings [to be planted in 3.5m x 3.5m grid]

Supplying of NPK fertilizer [0.10kg/plant]

Ground preparation & maintenance [7 L/days per 100.0m x 2.0m]

Planting & fertilizer application

properties.Name_of_Sp: Ulpatha Deniya at the bottom of the Welihela
properties.Observatio: The spring and the surrounding protected area should be measured and fenced off. About twenty families are illegally obtaining water from the spring.
properties.Descriptio:
Demarcate the boundaries-surrounding are of the spring

Providing barb wire fence with 07 nos of 14G barb wire rows fixed firmly between 7ft high concrete posts erected at 2.0m intervals along the fence - surrounding are of the spring

Filtration tank -

properties.Observatio: There is a about 0.5 acres reserve around the spring.

A spring located in the middle of a paddy field. There is a very small reserve on about one perch. About 10 acers of paddy fields under Gannila canal are cultivated with water flowing from the spring.
properties.Descriptio:
Demarcate the boundaries-Surrounding the reserve area

Providing barb wire fence with 07 nos of 14G barb wire rows fixed firmly between 7ft high concrete posts erected at 2.0m intervals along the fence - surrounding are of the spring
